Message.Title: What A P.O.S. STOCK this EBAY
Message.Msg: BEEN steadily going down everyday this week. POS POS POS

Message.Title: Way to go Yahooooooo........
Message.Msg: Where did all the posters go......not to mention all the POSTS? Can't remember ever seeing a post from six days ago on the first page What feedback do you need? The results speak volumes. You certainly know how to drive traffic??

Message.Title: yahoo raised ebay target $49.23 today
Message.Msg: 1y Target Est: $49.23 Yahoo raised ebay target to $49.23 today. Most are moving it to $60 now.

Message.Title: ebay will see a new high friday
Message.Msg: Friday's are up day's for ebay. ebay will see a new high friday ebay could cross $50 Friday.
